name: Helen Kim
text:
Hi #GCChat fam!

Our very own Hannah Campbell and Lauren Propst from the Disability GC group will be giving a really thoughtful talk on 9/9/21 at 4-5:30pm ET. They hope to engage with you in conversation on this very important topic! CEUs available and register for the talk!

name: Priya Marathe
text: There's so much to unpack when reading about orchid's genetic testing but also this claim as the reason for inequalities is... Really something #GCchat
